column1: How to write a popular copy for lululemon and post it on instagram?
column2:
Over the course of six days of running, theirFURTHER was found in joy, pain, love, fear, WorldRecords, teamwork,and 2880+ collective miles.
Thanks to each and every one of you that cheeredfor them from afar.lf we've learned anything, it's thaiFURTHER is a team sport.
#lululemonFURTHER

column1: How to write a popular copy for lululemon and post it on instagram?
column2:
The miles don't matter now, l only care aboutmy teammates and that we got to do this together..@vrikokwok
Yesterday Vriko ran 100 miles. A year ago, she hadn't run1K continuously. How did Vriko go FURTHER? With herteammates by her side.Swipe to relive a once-in-a-lifetime
#lululemonFURTHER

column1: How to write a popular copy for lululemon and post it on instagram?
column2: Less than 24hrs remaining of FURTHER. Let's send our athletes enough positive energy to fuel them althe way to the finish.The comments section is nowopen. Give us your best.#lululemonFURTHER

column1: How to write a popular copy for lululemon and post it on instagram?
column2:
Òlt's just running. lt's more than running.Ó KaylaJeter is 5 days into FURTHER-a 6-day ultramarathonthat's testing the limits of 10 trailblazing women.Collectively they've covered over 2400 miles, breakingrecords and personal bests along the way.
For Kayla, it goes beyond distance. Yes, she's alreadysurpassed her furthest 4 times over. But the real progresshas been in rallying behind her FURTHER teammates andliving into her purpose of diversifying the sport. Less than24 hours to go-keep those kudos coming.
Follow Kayla's #lululemonFURTHER journey on Strava byclickina the link on their bio.

column1: Dior has launched a new product. We need to write a popular copy and publish it on instagram. Please tell me how to write it.
column2: Under the guidance of the Creative Director of Dior'swomen's collections, this anthology interlaces pivotal textsfrom fashion historians with a deep dive into the artistrybehind the House's scarves since 1947. Among itscharming highlights is the transformation of the Parisscarf, from Monsieur Dior's 1950s Turgot map-inspiredpiece to @MariaGraziaChiuri's vision for the #DiorSS23collection, beautifully encapsulating the sentiment,'Muchmore than a formal detail, a dash of color or pattern, thosesilk squares actually concentrate a certain idea of creation'@ @BrigitteNiedermairStudio

column1: Dior has launched a new product. We need to write a popular copy and publish it on instagram. Please tell me how to write it.
column2: A singular heritage gracefully unfurls in an exquisitelycurated atlas of 425 scarves, each themed and adornedwith @BrigitteNiedermairStudio's spellbinding imagery.More than a mere feast for the eyes, this vibrant repertoireinvigorates the true sagas of fashion, featuring illustrationsthat traverse the spectrum of artistic innovation.© @BrigitteNiedermairStudio

column1: Dior has launched a new product. We need to write a popular copy and publish it on instagram. Please tell me how to write it.
column2:
Discover a rich conversation led by@MariaGraziaChiuri on the legacy of scarves within theHouse, culminating in the inspiration for the 'Dior ScarvesFashion Stories' book edited by @LaFrisa. As a.quintessential finishing touch, this delicate wardrobe piecestands out with imaginative prints by @PietroRuffoArtistand masterful savoir-faire, one that bridges the past andpresent. Find this thorough volume published by@ThamesAndHudson in bookstores now and dive into the
full video soon on our YouTube channel.
G Video:@MelindaTriana
Photo:@BrigitteNiedermairStudio

column1: Dior has launched a new product. We need to write a popular copy and publish it on instagram. Please tell me how to write it.

Art and fashion collided in a lively tableau at the#DiorxBrooklynMuseum's Artists Ball, celebratinginfluential artist Titus Kaphar and a thriving community ofcreatives.The #StarsinDior showed up in support, fitted indesigns by @MariaGraziaChiuri, with the Creative Directorof Dior's women's collections in attendance herself. Setagainst breathtaking decor from @DiorMaison, the eveningwas capped off by a performance from @LittleSimz,marking the defining crescendo of this iconic celebrationdedicated to nurturing artistic creativity.
© Photo: Myesha Evon Gardner
Music: Gorilla by little Simz
